title: Primary 1 Registration Exercise for Singapore Citizens & PRs 2025
description: The Primary 1 Registration Exercise for Singapore Citizens and Permanent Residents for the 2026 academic year commences on 1 July 2025. This online process encompasses several key phases: Phase 1 (1 July, 9am - 3 July, 4.30pm), Phase 2A (10 July, 9am - 11 July, 4.30pm), Phase 2B (21 July, 9am - 22 July, 4.30pm), Phase 2C (29 July, 9am - 31 July, 4.30pm), and Phase 2C Supplementary (18 August, 9am - 19 August, 4.30pm). Eligibility is for children born between 2 January 2019 and 1 January 2020 (inclusive). All registrations are conducted online via the MOE P1 Registration Portal. International students must submit an online 'indication of interest' form from 27 May, 9am to 2 June, 4.30pm, and will be notified by October 2025.
datetime_display: Registration periods for various phases from 27 May 2025 to 19 August 2025, with international student notifications by October 2025.
venue_name: Online via MOE P1 Registration Portal

title: Future World: Where Art Meets Science - Interactive Digital Wonderland for All Ages
description: Immerse yourself in a dynamic digital wonderland at ArtScience Museum's permanent exhibition, Future World: Where Art Meets Science, reimagined with breathtaking new installations. Collaborating with teamLab, this captivating gallery blends art and technology to create an expansive, interactive experience suitable for all ages. Engage with stunning visual projections, slide down an exciting digital fruit field, and bring your artworks to life through immersive drawing activities. The exhibit continually transforms with your interaction, showcasing evolving floral displays and flowing water trails. This unique exploration of art and technology fosters imagination and reflection on our interconnectedness with nature, offering endless photo opportunities and an unforgettable journey for families and art enthusiasts alike. The Crystal Universe, a popular photo spot, is temporarily closed for rehang work as of the latest updates.
price_display: From $30/adult & $25/child for Singapore Residents, $35/adult & $30/child for tourists. Free for kids on Fridays with adult ticket.
datetime_display: Daily, 10am - 7pm (last entry 6pm); Weekly tours every Monday at 4pm

title: Artland: Collaborative Clay Sculpting for Children and Families
description: Step into the whimsical world of Artland, a hands-on exhibition nestled within the ArtScience Laboratory, co-created by South Korean artist Do Ho Suh and his daughters. This engaging experience invites children and adults to sculpt their own imaginative animals and plants using vibrant modelling clay, then contribute their unique creations to an ever-expanding, fantastical ecosystem. These colourful clay 'islands' are flown in from around the globe, each bearing the artistic contributions of others, fostering a sense of interconnectedness and collaborative world-building. Artland celebrates the boundless creativity of children and its potential to inspire positive change, encouraging visitors to reflect on their relationship with nature. The exhibition offers a unique opportunity for interactive play and artistic expression, making it a delightful and thought-provoking activity for families seeking a blend of art and learning.

title: Mirror Mirror: An Immersive Journey into the Human Mind
description: Embark on a captivating voyage at 'Mirror Mirror: Journey Into the Mind' at ArtScience Museum, an exhibition that masterfully intertwines cutting-edge technology, interactive art, and neuroscience to unravel the infinite creativity of the human mind. This immersive experience guides visitors through eight distinct rooms, each offering a unique interpretation of mental faculties such as memory, perception, and dreams. Prepare to be enchanted by a symphony of vibrant colours, dazzling light effects, and atmospheric soundscapes that respond to your presence. The exhibition encourages active participation, allowing your actions to shape the evolving artistic displays. It's a surreal and sensory playground designed to ignite curiosity and foster self-discovery for all ages, providing a profound reflection on what makes us human. Be aware that the experience utilizes lighting, laser, and haze effects, which may affect photosensitive individuals.
datetime_display: 1 March – 6 July 2025; Friday – Saturday, 10am – 9pm; Sunday – Thursday, 10am – 7pm

title: ArtScience Laboratory: Creative Learning and Interactive Exploration
description: The newly launched ArtScience Laboratory at ArtScience Museum offers a dynamic and inspiring learning environment where art, science, and technology converge. This dedicated space, suitable for kids and grown-ups of all ages, invites visitors to explore how technology can be harnessed for creative expression through hands-on activities. Programmes are categorized into five engaging themes: inspiring workshops, creative activities, engineering explorations, sustainability initiatives, and wellness sessions. The laboratory is designed to foster new skills and deepen understanding of diverse subjects, encouraging interdisciplinary collaboration and problem-solving. With both complimentary walk-in workshops and ticketed programmes available, the ArtScience Laboratory provides an accessible and enriching platform for discovery and innovation, promoting a holistic approach to learning by blending advanced digital technologies with practical engagement.

title: Mind and Body: Exploring Human Existence Through Art and Science
description: Discover the profound intricacies of human existence at 'Mind and Body: The Art of Being Human,' a compelling series of exhibitions and programmes at ArtScience Museum. This thought-provoking exploration invites visitors to delve into what it truly means to think, feel, and simply exist as human beings in an era where technological advancements constantly challenge our understanding of cognition and form. The showcase meticulously investigates the mind-body relationship, demonstrating how contemporary science and art are re-envisioning the human body and celebrating the remarkable capabilities of the mind, from memory to creativity. Drawing insights from neuroscience, performance art, radical fashion, and cutting-edge technology, this collection encourages a deep dive into our evolving humanity. The ticket includes access to other extraordinary exhibitions such as 'Mirror Mirror: Journey Into the Mind' and 'Iris van Herpen: Sculpting the Senses'.
price_display: From $40/adult & $32/child – includes access to 'Mirror Mirror' and 'Iris van Herpen' exhibits

title: Flipside 2025: Les Patineurs: Roller skate battle - A thrilling performance blending roller skating and battle elements at Esplanade's outdoor garden
description: Experience the energy and excitement of 'Les Patineurs: Roller skate battle' at Flipside 2025. This captivating free outdoor performance features a dynamic roller skate battle, complete with acrobatics, juggling, and balancing acts. Part of the Esplanade's performing arts festival, Flipside 2025 offers a variety of free live shows and workshops throughout June, making it a perfect family outing. Don't miss this unique blend of sport and artistry, promising an unforgettable experience for all ages in the beautiful setting of the Esplanade Forecourt Garden.

title: Flipside 2025: Ketch Comedy Show: Clown, juggling, magic & more at Esplanade
description: Prepare for an evening of laughter and amazement at 'Ketch Comedy Show' during Flipside 2025. This free performance features a delightful mix of clowning, juggling, magic, and other captivating circus skills. Held at the Esplanade Concourse and DBS Foundation Outdoor Theatre, it's part of a larger performing arts festival offering a wide range of free live shows and workshops throughout June. This family-friendly event is perfect for all ages, promising a fun and entertaining experience filled with hilarious antics and impressive feats. Don't miss this opportunity to enjoy world-class street performance in a vibrant setting.
venue_name: Esplanade Concourse, DBS Foundation Outdoor Theatre at Esplanade

title: Flipside 2025: Aerial Open Stage: Stunning aerial performance at DBS Foundation Outdoor Theatre
description: Witness breathtaking aerial artistry at 'Aerial Open Stage' during Flipside 2025. This free performance showcases incredible aerialists displaying their strength, grace, and daring feats. Part of the Esplanade's performing arts festival, this event offers a unique opportunity to experience high-flying acrobatics in an outdoor setting. The festival throughout June features a variety of free live shows and workshops, making it an ideal family outing. Don't miss this chance to be mesmerized by the beauty and skill of aerial performance, promising an unforgettable experience under the open sky.
venue_name: DBS Foundation Outdoor Theatre at Esplanade

title: Flipside 2025: Witty Look Show: Unicycle acrobatics at Esplanade Courtyard - A dazzling display of balance and skill
description: Experience the incredible feats of unicycle acrobatics at the 'Witty Look Show' during Flipside 2025. This free performance at the Esplanade Courtyard promises a dazzling display of balance, agility, and comedic timing. As part of Esplanade's performing arts festival in June, this event is a highlight among many free live shows and workshops. It's a perfect family-friendly outing, offering entertainment and wonder for all ages. Don't miss the chance to witness these unique and impressive skills in a vibrant outdoor setting, guaranteeing a memorable experience.

title: Flipside 2025: Stylish Comedy Show: Comedy magicians & jugglers at Esplanade
description: Get ready for a night of laughter and wonder at the 'Stylish Comedy Show' during Flipside 2025. This free performance features a fantastic lineup of comedy magicians and jugglers, promising an evening filled with hilarious antics and impressive tricks. Held at the Esplanade Concourse and DBS Foundation Outdoor Theatre, it's a key part of the Esplanade's performing arts festival, which offers a variety of free live shows and workshops throughout June. This family-friendly event is perfect for all ages, ensuring a fun and engaging experience with its unique blend of humour and skill.
venue_name: Esplanade Concourse, DBS Foundation Outdoor Theatre at Esplanade

title: Flipside 2025: OVVIO: Balancing tricks at DBS Foundation Outdoor Theatre - A mesmerizing display of equilibrium and skill
description: Witness the incredible feats of balance at 'OVVIO', a captivating performance during Flipside 2025. Held at the DBS Foundation Outdoor Theatre, this free show showcases extraordinary balancing tricks that will leave you in awe. As part of the Esplanade's performing arts festival in June, 'OVVIO' is one of many free live performances and workshops designed for all ages. It's an excellent opportunity for families to enjoy unique and impressive acts in a beautiful outdoor setting, promising a truly memorable and visually stunning experience.
venue_name: DBS Foundation Outdoor Theatre at Esplanade

title: Flipside 2025: A Show with Strings: Engaging puppetry & clowning at Esplanade Concourse
description: Delight in the enchanting world of 'A Show with Strings', a charming performance featuring puppetry and clowning, presented during Flipside 2025. This free show at the Esplanade Concourse offers a magical experience for all ages, blending whimsical puppet narratives with comedic clowning. Part of the Esplanade's performing arts festival, this event is one of many free live performances and workshops available throughout June. It's a wonderful opportunity for families to enjoy imaginative storytelling and entertaining acts, promising a fun-filled and memorable outing.

title: Children's Season at CMSG: 'For a Better Future' – An interactive performance encouraging kid participation
description: Engage your children in 'For a Better Future', an interactive performance at Children's Museum Singapore's Children's Season 2025. This unique theatre experience encourages kids to actively participate in the show, fostering creativity and engagement. The Children's Season also offers 'Tools and Treats: A Tasty Journey', focusing on Singapore's food heritage with hands-on play and heritage snack kits. This event is designed to provide plenty of laughs and educational fun, making it a perfect outing for families seeking interactive and enriching experiences.

title: Children's Season at CMSG: 'Tools and Treats: A Tasty Journey' – A hands-on musical exploring Singapore's food heritage
description: Embark on 'Tools and Treats: A Tasty Journey' at Children's Museum Singapore's Children's Season 2025. This delightful and interactive musical performance offers plenty of laughs and hands-on play centered around Singapore's rich food heritage. Children will have the opportunity to engage with the theme and even bring home a heritage snack kit. Alongside 'For a Better Future', this event is part of a larger Children's Season program designed to provide enriching and entertaining experiences for young ones, fostering cultural appreciation through fun activities.

title: Anne Maria Lim and the Magic Organ kids' concert - Introduce your children to the enchanting world of classical music
description: Introduce your children to the captivating world of classical music with 'Anne Maria Lim and the Magic Organ', a delightful kids' concert presented by the Singapore Symphony Orchestra (SSO). This enchanting performance tells the tale of Mr Majeika, a wizard created by the popular UK composer Bob Chilcott, and aims to showcase the fascinating pipe organ. As part of the SSO Organ Series, the event also includes engaging fringe activities like exhibitions and live pipe organ demonstrations, making it a truly magical and educational evening for young audiences.

title: Lang Lang Plays Disney In Concert: A magical kids' concert featuring iconic Disney songs
description: Bring your little Disney fan to a magical evening at 'Lang Lang Plays Disney In Concert', where the legendary Chinese pianist Lang Lang performs iconic Disney songs. This two-day exclusive event in Singapore features beloved tunes such as 'Let It Go', 'We Don't Talk About Bruno', 'You'll Be in My Heart', and 'When You Wish Upon a Star'. It's a rare opportunity to experience the magic of Disney music brought to life by a world-renowned artist, promising an unforgettable concert experience for the whole family.
venue_name: The Star Theatre, The Star Performing Arts Centre

title: Peter & Blue's School Holiday 2025: A heartwarming kids' ballet performance by Singapore Ballet
description: Celebrate the school holidays with 'Peter & Blue's School Holiday 2025', a delightful and kid-friendly ballet performance by the Singapore Ballet. Follow Peter and his loyal dog, Blue, on their exciting school holiday escapade filled with laughter, friendship, and imaginative play. This heartwarming show is perfect for introducing young audiences to the beauty of ballet in a captivating and accessible way. It's a wonderful opportunity for families to enjoy a cultural outing together, promising an enchanting experience for all.

title: The Puppet Master – A Night With Disney Songs: A magical musical story with reimagined Disney classics
description: Step into a magical world with 'The Puppet Master – A Night With Disney Songs', a unique musical story presented by Cellography, Singapore's first cello pop orchestra. This family-friendly show follows the adventure of a puppet who comes to life and embarks on a journey with his creator, encountering tough choices and even a witch. Enjoy reimagined Disney songs like 'Beauty and the Beast' and 'A Whole New World' by local composer Hughes Chong. Kids are encouraged to dress up as their favourite characters for a show filled with music, heart, and a touch of magic.

title: Symphony in the Gardens: FREE family concert by Singapore Symphony Orchestra at Botanic Gardens
description: Enjoy a perfect FREE weekend activity at 'Symphony in the Gardens', where the Singapore Symphony Orchestra (SSO) performs classical tunes at the beautiful Shaw Foundation Symphony Stage. Pack a picnic, gather your family and even your furkids, and immerse yourselves in live music amidst the serene setting of the Singapore Botanic Gardens. This beloved event offers a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere, making classical music accessible to all ages. It's an excellent opportunity to unwind and create lasting memories with loved ones in a stunning natural environment.
venue_name: Shaw Foundation Symphony Stage, Singapore Botanic Gardens

title: Roald Dahl's Fantastic Mr Fox: A cunning and courageous kids' play at Victoria Theatre
description: Embark on an exciting adventure with 'Roald Dahl's Fantastic Mr Fox' at Victoria Theatre. This engaging kids' play brings to life the cunning and courageous Mr Fox as he strives to outsmart greedy farmers and save his family. The production is filled with music, song, dance, humor, and memorable characters, making it a hit with young audiences. With themes of community and resilience, this fun theatre show is also available in Mandarin, offering an enriching and entertaining experience for children and families alike.

title: Disney's Fantasia film screening with live orchestra: An iconic cinematic experience with SSO
description: Experience the magic of Disney's iconic 'Fantasia' like never before, accompanied by a live classical music performance by the Singapore Symphony Orchestra (SSO). This visually captivating film, paired with the powerful sounds of Beethoven, Stravinsky, Tchaikovsky, Bach, and more, offers a unique cinematic and musical journey. The show runs for two hours with a 20-minute intermission, making it suitable for older children and adults. It's a rare opportunity to immerse yourself in this timeless masterpiece with the added grandeur of a live orchestral performance.

title: Koko The Great: A captivating kids' theatre show for little ones with big imaginations
description: Inspire big imaginations with 'Koko The Great', a captivating kids' theatre show at Esplanade Theatre Studio. This delightful performance follows the adventures of Koko, a little village boy, as he confronts his fear of the unknown and discovers the unexpected joys it brings. Perfect for young audiences, the show encourages courage and open-mindedness, making it a meaningful and entertaining experience. It's an ideal outing for families looking for a charming and thought-provoking theatre production that will spark creativity in their children.

title: Disney Jr. Live On Tour: The biggest playdate ever with Mickey, Minnie, and friends!
description: Join Mickey, Minnie, Goofy, the Puppy Dog Pals, and more for 'Disney Jr. Live On Tour: The Biggest Playdate Ever!' at the Singapore Indoor Stadium. This exciting kids' theatre show promises a grand playdate, but mysterious weather threatens the fun. Team Spidey from “Marvel's Spidey and His Amazing Friends” steps in to uncover the cause and save the day. It's a thrilling, interactive adventure filled with beloved characters, perfect for young Disney Jr. fans. Get ready to sing, dance, and help your favorite heroes solve the mystery!

title: The Tiger Who Came to Tea: A playful stage adaptation of the classic story for kids aged 3+
description: Step into a world of whimsical chaos with 'The Tiger Who Came to Tea', a playful stage adaptation of the beloved classic story. When a tiger unexpectedly arrives at Sophie's door for tea, pandemonium ensues! This engaging production is packed with catchy songs, delightful magic, and plenty of laughs, making it perfect for children aged 3 and up. Running just under an hour with no intervals, it's an ideal introduction to live theatre for young audiences. Prepare for a charming and memorable experience that brings this iconic tale to life.

title: SSO Babies' Proms: An interactive concert for littles to explore orchestral instruments
description: The Singapore Symphony Orchestra's (SSO) 'Babies' Proms' is back, offering a unique and interactive concert experience for the youngest music lovers. This event encourages families to move along to the music and explore various orchestral instruments, fostering a relaxed and engaging atmosphere. Unlike traditional concerts, kids are not expected to sit still, making it an ideal introduction to classical music for babies and toddlers. It's a wonderful opportunity for families to enjoy beautiful melodies and hands-on musical exploration together.

title: Ballet Under the Stars: A relaxed picnic ballet performance featuring classic and modern pieces
description: Enjoy a magical evening at 'Ballet Under the Stars', a family-friendly ballet performance offering a relaxed picnic vibe at Fort Canning Green. The Singapore Ballet will showcase both classic and modern pieces, including 'Paquita' and 'Incomparable Beauty', providing a diverse and captivating program. It's a wonderful opportunity to introduce your children to the beauty of ballet while enjoying the fresh air and a wholesome picnic. This unique outdoor setting creates a memorable experience for the whole family, blending artistic performance with a laid-back atmosphere.

title: CoComelon & Blippi Sing-A-Long Live: Join JJ and friends for a lively musical sing-along
description: Get ready for a treat with 'CoComelon & Blippi Sing-A-Long Live', where JJ and friends take the stage for the first time in Singapore at Sands Theatre at Marina Bay Sands. Fans of CoComelon can warm up their voices and groove along to favorite songs like “If You're Happy and You Know It,” “Wheels on the Bus”, and “Head, Shoulders, Knees and Toes.” This lively musical promises an interactive and fun-filled experience for young children, encouraging them to sing and dance with their beloved characters in a vibrant live setting.
venue_name: Sands Theatre at Marina Bay Sands
address: 10 Bayfront Ave, B1-69/70 The Shoppes, Marina Bay Sands, Singapore 018971

title: Cirque Alice: A mesmerizing circus show blending Alice in Wonderland with acrobatics and contortionists
description: Step into a whimsical 'Wonderland' with 'Cirque Alice', a mesmerizing circus show that combines the magic of Alice in Wonderland with spectacular acrobatics, contortionists, puppetry, and aerialists. Held at the Sands Theatre, Marina Bay Sands, this production promises to keep you on the edge of your seat with its dazzling performances. Enjoy classical hits reimagined with a contemporary spin, creating a unique and enchanting experience. It's a visually stunning and artistic show perfect for families seeking a captivating and imaginative theatrical event.

title: The Three Billy Goats Gruff: A fun musical spin on the classic childhood tale by SRT
description: Relive the classic childhood tale with a fun musical twist in 'The Three Billy Goats Gruff', presented by the Singapore Repertory Theatre. This engaging play follows the three goats on their adventurous journey to cross a bridge in search of food during a drought, where they encounter a terrifying troll. Expect plenty of laughs and catchy tunes by award-winning duo George Stiles and Anthony Drewe. It's a heartwarming and entertaining production perfect for young audiences, promising a memorable theatrical experience for the whole family.
datetime_display: From 10 October 2025, Monday – Friday 9:30am & 11:30am; Saturday – Sunday 11am & 2pm

title: Temasek Foundation x SSO Halloween Spooktacular!: A fun spooky kids' concert for Halloween
description: Celebrate Halloween in a fun and spooky way with 'Temasek Foundation x SSO Halloween Spooktacular!', a delightful kids' concert presented by the Singapore Symphony Orchestra. Get ready for a performance filled with witches, ghouls, skeletons, and more, all set to spooky tunes. This relaxed performance is designed for children to enjoy without needing to sit still, encouraging a lively atmosphere. Families are encouraged to wear their best Halloween costumes for an extra festive touch, promising a memorable and exciting musical experience for all ages.
organiser: Temasek Foundation x Singapore Symphony Orchestra (SSO)

title: The Emperor's New Clothes: A musical spin on the Hans Christian Andersen folktale by Wild Rice
description: Experience 'The Emperor's New Clothes', a musical adaptation of the classic Hans Christian Andersen folktale, brought to life by Wild Rice. This production tells the story of a flamboyant Emperor who falls victim to two cheeky tailors determined to teach him a lesson. Just in time for the year-end holiday season, this kids' play is guaranteed to be filled with laughter, catchy tunes, and of course, fashionable fits. It's a vibrant and entertaining show that promises to captivate young audiences with its witty narrative and lively performances.

title: Beauty and the Beast The Musical: Step into a magical world this December at Sands Theatre
description: Step into a magical world this December as 'Beauty and the Beast The Musical' arrives in Singapore, its only stop in Asia! Get ready to sing along to your favourite songs like 'Be Our Guest' with dazzling costumes, amazing sets, and all your beloved characters brought to life in a totally new way. This kids' theatre musical offers a fairytale adventure you won't want to miss, promising an enchanting and memorable experience for the entire family during the holiday season.
datetime_display: 11 December 2025 – 4 January 2026, various days and timings

title: Magic Hour @ Raffles Hotel Singapore: Free kids' concert by Singapore Symphony Orchestra at The Lawn
description: Enjoy a delightful evening at 'Magic Hour @ Raffles Hotel Singapore', a free kids' concert held every other month at The Lawn, Raffles Arcade. Bring your little ones to enjoy classical music performed by the Singapore Symphony Orchestra, pack a picnic, and enjoy light bites and drinks available at the venue. It's a wonderful opportunity for families to experience high-quality music in a relaxed and elegant outdoor setting, fostering a love for classical tunes in a beautiful and historic location.
venue_name: The Lawn, Raffles Arcade at Raffles Hotel

title: SSO Christmas Concert: Celebrate the year-end festivities with wintry tunes at Esplanade Concert Hall
description: Celebrate the year-end festivities at the 'SSO Christmas Concert' at the Esplanade Concert Hall. The Singapore Symphony Orchestra will perform your favorite wintry tunes, and you're encouraged to sing along, creating a joyous and festive atmosphere. This heartwarming concert is perfect for families looking to immerse themselves in the spirit of Christmas through beautiful classical music. It's a wonderful tradition to enjoy with loved ones, promising an evening filled with holiday cheer and beloved melodies.

title: Candlelight Concerts: A magical musical experience by candlelight across various Singapore locations
description: Immerse your family in a magical musical experience at 'Candlelight Concerts', held in various enchanting locations across Singapore, from the SEA Aquarium to Chijmes. These unique concerts feature music performed by candlelight, creating a captivating and intimate atmosphere. Best suited for children aged 8 years and older, it's a wonderful opportunity to introduce older kids to classical and contemporary music in a truly memorable setting. Each venue offers a distinct ambiance, making every concert a unique and special event.

title: PA Family PLAYGround 2025: Free Activities & Workshops Across Singapore
description: PA Family PLAYGround 2025 offers a fun-filled family day out during the school holidays, packed with free activities for all ages. Enjoy life-sized board games and challenge friends with Mega Jenga. Unleash creativity at interactive family workshops including Paper Quilling and Acrylic Pour Painting. Older kids can try a DIY Recycling Bin workshop, and families can participate in parent-child workout classes. The event also features an SG60 Wishing Wall and Digital Pledge Wall for practicing gratitude. Contribute to the community through the 'CARE in Every Bottle' initiative, where purchasing a $10 juice bottle directly benefits the Community Chest. Experience free bouncy castles and a giant ball pit. This mega family playground provides opportunities to play, learn, appreciate, and care for family and community, creating core memories and fostering bonding through hands-on experiences and nostalgic childhood games. The event is held at multiple community clubs across Singapore.

title: ICS's Virtual Open House: University Preparation & Application Fee Waiver
description: Discover how the International Community School's Advanced Placement (AP) courses provide a competitive edge for university admissions. This virtual open house offers insights into ICS's rigorous, college-level academics, and how students consistently outperform global benchmarks. Learn about personalised academic counselling, the supportive community, and real-world experiences that prepare students for success. Attendees will also receive information on securing a $500 waiver on their application fee, providing an excellent opportunity for prospective students and their families to explore the school's offerings and understand the pathways to prestigious universities.
price_display: Free (with a $500 application fee waiver offered)
